messages.content:
You could consider, for the ask the team, to do a weekly stream of a few developers (if they're comfortable) going through questions(?). 

Perhaps a mixture of asked questions asked by the community, information you want to share or something completely random. 

I think discussing a piece of artwork and explaining more of the thought behind it would already be very interesting, for example. And it helps to have someone explain the concept behind things. To put it in perspective.
There's a few of these things in mind further down the line. I really didn't expect the server to grow this quickly so things are spaced out!
